data.system_settings: iPhone 6s, iOS 11.3 & iPad Air 2, iOS 11.4 PB 1
data.actual_result: Since such Skype URI user links don't work with the mobile Skype apps, the Skype app won't be opened and you get an error in your browser.
data.expected_result: There should be no link or just the Skype app should be opened.
data.short_description: Skype account links don't open the Skype app
data.steps_to_repro: - Find any user that linked a Skype account - Open his user profile - Find the linked Skype account there and click on it - Select the option "Open in browser"
